New Quora or TikTok Fully Powered by AI Translation | Original

Home 2024.12

  • A new TikTok or Quora fully powered by AI translation.

  • Similar to X, Threads, Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook, LinkedIn, Reddit, YouTube.

  • These platforms, which already have international subdomains, are most in need of such features due to their large international user base.

  • Every post or answer created by users can be saved in a single language. To simplify, it should use the platform’s default language. Before submission, the system translates content into that language, or users can edit the content at any time.

  • Platforms will automatically translate content into 20 languages.

  • AI tools will issue warnings for naming translations, as names are often difficult to translate correctly. In edge cases, it should warn users or allow for human correction.

  • Users can view content in their preferred language.

  • Text in images and audio in videos can also be translated. The EzDubs bot in X is a step toward this future.

  • Zoom or Teams meetings should also support translation, with translation speed being crucial in these settings.
